short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It’s Sweeps! You can play our sweepstakes and contests to win prizes like vacations, cars, VIP events, makeovers and points.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Win free stuff with Shop Your Way sweepstakes and contests! Do you enjoy playing online sweepstakes and free contests? Do you like winning prizes? With Shop Your Way Sweeps, you can win prizes from Sears, Kmart and more. 

Playing sweepstakes and contests with Sweeps is fun! You can meet other members, pick your own prizes, curate catalogs, suggest products to friends and access all the Shop Your Way member free benefits!

Shop’in at a Sears store or Kmart store for a chance to win free stuff with Sweeps. Start playing Shop Your Way Sweeps and come back daily for more chances to win free prizes and points that you can enjoy using at Sears and Kmart.
